Package uk.ac.ncl.csc8404.coursework.management

Class StudentManagement

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.ncl.csc8404.coursework.management.StudentManagement
  • public class StudentManagement
extends java.lang.Object
    StudentManagement - Class which acts as an utility class and manages the University Actions taken on the Student. Uses the singleton design pattern to ensure only one instance of the class is present.

    • Field Summary

      • registerStudent

        public void registerStudent​(StudentDetails s)
        Method to Registers a new student and allocate a student id. Adds a student to student map Repository.
        Parameters:
        s - for using the StudentDetails class Prints the student map size before and after the registration to confirm the addition of record.

      • noOfStudents

        public int noOfStudents​(StudentType type)
        Method to get the no of students for a particular type who are registered.
        Parameters:
        type - to get the student type
        Returns:
        the count of student for the particular student type

      • terminateStudent

        public void terminateStudent​(java.lang.String id)
        Method to remove the student record after the student leaves the university
        Parameters:
        id - the student id number used for termination Prints the student map size before and after the termination to confirm the removal of student record.

      • hasRegistered

        public boolean hasRegistered​(java.lang.String id)
        Boolean method to check if the student is registered in the repository
        Parameters:
        id - student id
        Returns:
        the student id from the student map

      • ammendStudentData

        public void ammendStudentData​(java.lang.String studentid,
                              StudentDetails s1)
        Method to replace the old student details with new details, except the student id
        Parameters:
        studentid - id of the student
        s1 - student details

      • getStudent

        public StudentDetails getStudent​(java.lang.String id)
        Method to fetch the details of a student student registered in the Repo.
        Parameters:
        id - student id
        Returns:
        if student is present in the repo returns the student id else returns null.

      • issueStudentSmartCard

        public void issueStudentSmartCard​(java.lang.String id)
        Method to create Smart Card and issue to the student with the provided ID
        Parameters:
        id - student id returns the existing SmartCard if student with the provided id already has a smart card issued

      • studentDataquery
